topics.title: Rainforest Conservation
topics.description: Rainforests are Earth's oldest living ecosystems, home to more than half of the world's plant and animal species. Learn how deforestation threatens these vital ecosystems and what we can do to protect them.

quiz.question: What percentage of the world's species live in rainforests?
How much of the original rainforest cover has been destroyed?

topics.title: Ocean Protection
topics.description: Oceans cover 71% of our planet and are vital to all life on Earth. Discover the impacts of plastic pollution, overfishing, and climate change on marine ecosystems and how we can help preserve them.

quiz.question: How much of the ocean is currently protected?

topics.title: Recycling & Waste Reduction
topics.description: Proper waste management is crucial for reducing pollution and conserving resources. Learn about recycling processes, composting, and how to minimize your environmental footprint through conscious consumption.

quiz.question: What percentage of plastic waste is actually recycled globally?

topics.title: Climate Change
topics.description: Climate change is the defining issue of our time. Understand its causes, effects on weather patterns, ecosystems, and human societies, and explore solutions to mitigate its impact.

topics.title: Renewable Energy
topics.description: Transitioning to renewable energy sources is key to reducing greenhouse gas emissions. Learn about solar, wind, hydro, and other clean energy technologies shaping our sustainable future.

topics.title: Wildlife Conservation
topics.description: Biodiversity is essential for healthy ecosystems. Discover the threats facing endangered species, conservation success stories, and how you can contribute to protecting wildlife.
